contentrichtext.text: == Summary == {{Non-free use rationale album cover| Article = Over the Edge Vol. 3: The Weatherman's Dumb Stupid Come-Out Line | Use = Infobox <!-- ADDITIONAL INFORMATION --> | Name = Over the Edge Vol. 3: The Weatherman's Dumb Stupid Come-Out Line | Artist = [[Negativland]] | Label = [[SST Records|SST]] (original) / [[Seeland Records|Seeland]] (reissue) | Graphic Artist = | Item = | Type = album | Website = | Owner = | Commentary = <!--OVERRIDE FIELDS --> | Description = Album cover for ''[[Over the Edge Vol. 3: The Weatherman's Dumb Stupid Come-Out Line]]'' by [[Negativland]]. | Source = Downloaded from Amazon.com [http://images.amazon.com/images/P/B000009D4W.01.LZZZZZZZ.jpg]. | Portion = | Low_resolution = | Purpose = <!--Must be specified if Use is not Infobox / Header / Section / Artist--> | Replaceability = | other_information = Based on a painting by Chris Yambar from a drawing of [[David Wills (musician)|The Weatherman]] by [[Richard Lyons (musician)|Richard Lyons]]. "N© and N℗ 1982, 1983, 1984, and 1998. Time goes very fast with so many clocks tickin' off the minutes. In no time at all it will be time to die. Owned in perpetuity by Negativland and [[Seeland Records|Seeland MediaMedia]]." }} == Licensing == {{Non-free album cover|image has rationale=yes}}[[Category:Negativland albums]]
